# KVS & NVS Re-open Applications For Thousands Of Teaching And Non-Teaching Posts

**Category:** india
**Generated (UTC):** 2025-12-15T05:55:14+00:00
**Published:** Dec 14, 2025
**Publisher:** NDTV

## Summary
Kendriya Vidyalaya Sangathan (KVS) and Navodaya Vidyalaya Samiti (NVS) have reopened applications for over 15,000 teaching and non-teaching vacancies. Exams are scheduled to begin in January 2026.
